root.name: Scooby Doo! Case File #3: Frights, Camera, Mystery!
root.description: PlotScooby-Doo and the Gang visit Hollywood, but it seems where ever they go, there's a spooky mistery to solve. This time, a headless stuntman has been scaring off the actors and crew of a movie studio, named Grizzly Studios. It's up to you to solve the mystery! Gameplay Scooby-Doo! Case File #3: Frights, Camera, Mystery! improves on the point and click adventure nature of the series, by adding six new fun-filled activities. The usual clue-finding aspect of the game is still there.System Requirements Windows® 2000 SP4/XP (Home Pro) SP2/Vista1 Pentium® IV 1.8 GHz processor or faster 200 MB free hard disk space2 512 MB of memory (RAM) available 16X CD-ROM drive or faster DirectX® 8.1 compatible or higher 16-bit colour monitor capable of 800 x 600 resolution Video Card with 64MB of video RAM DirectX® 8.1 compatible or higher sound card Mouse Speakers
